name: Burning of Time
description:
Instructions: Move using WASD keys. Collect flashing blue sphere powerups. Left-click to use the powerup and become invincible for a brief time, passing through obstacles.

Earlier the unicorn completed one of its assignments in helping two lost souls to flee the Terrell Corporation. Now it is time to guide the unicorn back to the hands of its maker so it can be whole again with the other operatives.

A game designed by Pamela Vargas.

Programming by David Blosser.
